title: UPGRADE
description: In the year 2058, life is lived entirely ONLINE, everything bright and colorful and utterly convenient. It’s a glowing, glitzy, glorious world... and every time another "UPGRADE" hits, things just keep getting better! Among the millions of happy citizens is Avery J. Mankin, "exemplary through and through" as his mother likes to brag. At least he was, until that awful day when he was falsely accused of a crime, got banished from the System, and found himself fighting for his life...Written by Louis Rosenberg, with artwork by Stan Timmons, “UPGRADE” is a graphic novel in three parts.
author: Louis Rosenberg
